headline: Is Devon Energy (DVN) Offering Value After Mixed Multi Year Share Price Performance
summary: If you are wondering whether Devon Energy is offering good value at around US$35.89 per share, you are not alone. This article is set up to help you frame that question clearly. The stock has seen mixed returns, with a 2.5% decline over the last 7 days, a 4.2% decline over 30 days, a 5.2% decline year to date, but a 6.3% gain over 1 year and a 136.0% gain over 5 years, while the 3 year return sits at a 35.8% decline. Recent price swings in energy stocks have often been tied to shifting...

headline: A Look At Devon Energy (DVN) Valuation As Analyst Interest And CEO Conference Appearance Draw Focus
summary: Recent attention on Devon Energy (DVN) has been driven by a mix of cautious but generally positive analyst coverage, along with investors gearing up for CEO Clay Gaspar’s upcoming appearance at the Goldman Sachs energy conference. See our latest analysis for Devon Energy. Against this backdrop, Devon’s 1 day share price return of a 1.81% decline and 7 day share price return of a 2.53% decline sit alongside a 90 day share price return of a 2.63% gain.
